snippet: Health care legislation is complicated. And efforts to sum it up in a vivid, memorable phrase can result in images that verge on the surreal....

headline.main: There Is No Economic Case for Breaking Up the United Kingdom, Says May
headline.print_headline: There Is No Economic Case for Breaking Up the United Kingdom, Says May

lead_paragraph: Health care legislation is complicated. And efforts to sum it up in a vivid, memorable phrase can result in images that verge on the surreal.
